name: Double Gun Disaster
description:
Please full-screen in browser! The aspect ratio is weird.

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2021

A damage-dealing gun and a buff gun are joined together, so as you shoot enemies, you make them more powerful.   As the game progresses, you can find ways to buff yourself and avoid buffing your enemies.

Standard top-down shooter controls; WASD (or arrow keys) to move, mouse to aim, left mouse to shoot. It might work on gamepad too.
